channel.title: Sites on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Sites on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: del.icio.us link list
item.description: to the left side of my page I added my del.icio.us bookmark list. this will hopefully have a list of all the sites I have enjoyed recently. ;) get one for yourself. or look at my WHOLE list here.i have been really busy at work today. I find it interesting that the more busy I am at work the more I update my blog. in all my breaks I think of something to write.
